column5: http://video.google.ca/videoplay?docid=-6980177851806866993  Check it out! Hope you all enjoy it.
bahahaha!  "the water is mercuryer"  "see that 6-8? thats how you release a fish"  great job guys. now if i could only get my old outboard running....
Nice work guys, entertaining as always.  Did you get a look at the final leader board? interested in what the top fish weighed in at.
That was awesome i wish some of the other shows out there were a little more real like that. Looks like they were having a great time.

The top largemouth was something like 4.03lbs and top smallmouth was a little over 5. That's all I remember.. we kinda got bored and went back out to pound the pike for a while, lol  Thanks for the comments guys.
One of these days I'll get to watch your videos....from all I've read they're great.  Maureen
Dang! I cant see the video from work. I will bump this thread and watch it when I get home!!!
fun video thanks for posting!  cheers!
Like normal .....YOU GUYS ROCK!!! Monster pike man   Always entertaining. Keep'em coming.
Excellant video!!!! I really enjoy these vids, Rich!! Keep em coming!!
I had a blast making this one and i fianlly got to weigh in a bass! Lookin forward to more days like that one on the bay
nice Job!  To bad Eric was knocked from the leader board though
